original_text: And the extra that remains in the length of the curtains, the cubit on the one side, and the cubit on the other side, shall hang over the sides of the tabernacle, on this side and that side, to cover it.
korean_text: 막 곧 휘장의 길이의 남은 것은 이쪽에 한 규빗, 저쪽에 한 규빗씩 성막 좌우 양쪽에 덮어 늘어뜨리고

sentences.original_text: And the extra that remains in the length of the curtains,
the cubit on the one side,
and the cubit on the other side,
shall hang over the sides of the tabernacle,
on this side and that side,
